name: The room is on fire
description:
Will you save your spaceship from the fire and other troubles? Use specials tools to resolve the catastrophic situation and save yourself from terrible death.

This game require a HTC Vive and use room scale to navigate between each issues you have to resolve to save your spacehip.

- Project Manager -

Mathieu Genoud

- Graphists -

Théo Droulez
Josselin Large

- Game Developer -

Ludovic Feltz

-Game Designer-
